title: I despise Riot's obsession with saving essence flare
body:
"We recognize several champions make good use of essence flare"

{{champion:24}} God forbid he can't counter strike every second and be basically immune to auto-based champs because he pressed R.

{{champion:114}} God forbid she can't dash every .3 seconds

{{champion:11}} God forbid he can't alpha strike every 1.5 seconds

Essence flare is a shitty mechanic that should have never even been created, and the fact that you shat on spear's original idea and used the item as an excuse to keep this cancerous tool in the game is an absolute tragedy.

replies.body: I'm still annoyed that their logic was that spear had too much overlap with steraks. I don't even get that. One stops burst the other throttles dps. They're not the same.

Guess we just don't have enough ways of boosting damage... We need more, harder and faster.

It annoys me to no end, they implement Spear as yet another (broken) damage increase item, instead of the mixed dmg/mitigation item it was meant to. The problem with this game is not lack of damage, or people not being able to spam abilities enough... Guess Rito disagrees.

Well, I'd rather not have another Offensive but at the same time defensive item for bruisers.
It's not like it was an item for tanks anyway.
All the cancerous champs would use it and be tanky as fk

They could make it melee only - and even better, make the mitigation scale of base AD in some shape or form. Could i.e. only start scaling above 100 base AD, kinda like warmogs 3000 hp requirement for regen.

In general they could start basing the juggernaut items around base ADs, and start tuning base AD scaling on those items, in whatever form they choose. It would also make individual champions far easier to to balance. Item making a champion overperform? Nerf the base AD of said champion a little, with it actually having some impact all game through.

Well, I would still rather see the old shojin passive on an armor+HP item with a tad of offensiveness (maybe something that synergizes with thornmail? ADC have their items synergize with runes etc so why not tanks too)

I think we should make bruisers squishier and tanks tankier in order to make our game experience better.

Creating ad items that will make darius, riven, yasuo and all ad bruisers/skirmishers do their job with more safety is the wrong direction imo. 
I think the most AD an item that provides defences should be like 40.

I really don't think we should make immobile juggernauts any squishier - ie. Darius is squishy af, unless ahead by a decent margin. He can not take any kind of focus fire by the enemy team - he just crumbles, big time, doesn't even get to utilize his in combat sustain... Specially if just one lane is fed. He works far better in tandem with other tanky dudes to take the focus off him till he can actually pop off.

Though, feel free to gut those dashes-and-plays-for-days and all-the-agency-are-belong-to-me champions somewhat. I despise Irelia, Jax, Yas, Camille, etc etc, and even Trynd and Fiora, because they have to fuck up hard for you to beat them as an immobile champion, and at some point, they will just outscale and facetank. Essence Flare/Awakened Dragon just solidifies that cancerous shit even more.

But I do agree that tanks should be tankier - specially at 3+ items. At that point they start blowing up too. -.- I'm even hoping they remove Conq so we can actually work towards having tanks actually soaking up dmg for more than 2 secs.
Yeah I don't think the current iteration of Spear is good but the old iteration would've been just as cancerous.
They could have done so much with that item, instead they went with the cop out and decided to give Riven an item that makes her more brainless.

>
> They could have done so much with that item, instead they went with the cop out and decided to give Riven an item that makes her more brainless.

Strange, every site I know and YouTube video that talks about Riven says she is one of if not the hardest champion to play properly. So you can do the Fast Q every time perfectly without fail?

Heres all you need: Attack speed. That item grants it in the effect and lets be honest, Dawnbreaker Riven allows for much easier Q auto weaves than the base does.

I have no clue if I can do a fast Q auto weave, because I personally don't like the champ's kit, plain and simple. Doesn't mean me saying this is hating on the kit and her. The "hardest" part of her kit is slowly but surely becoming a norm, just like when Yasuo was "hard". People have slowly adapted without realizing it.

Sure riven has a high skill cap, but her skill entry is low, same with yasuo.

You don't need to be godlike mechanics as the champion can do the work for you, but if you do have godlike mechanic than every game becomes a stomp fest.

Riven used to require some levels of mechanics but around season 6-7 they improved the auto weaving mechanic and improved the way her abilities interacted with walls etc.

That might have been the case years ago when riot didnt make her animation cancel easier and easier to the point it's nearly the champions default mechanic.
Not even talking about all the p2w skins. 

Also even without any animation cancel or weaving in autoattacks rivens Q deals 285 base dmg on it's on. That's more than most champions in the game.

You forgot Riven.
EDIT: And Ren. I was more focused on the fact she's top tier when mains have said "shes shit".

No Trynd worth his salt ever built Essence Reaver after it was reworked into Essence Flare. That shit is garbage and so is this version of Spear of Shojin.

{{champion:11}} is just a huge problem with current items. His passive gives him an extra auto every 4 hits, that's fine. With rageblade, his passive gives him an extra auto every 2 hits. This feeds into rageblade itself. That's a problem. Add essence flare to a champion that auto attacks 4-5 times a second and you suddenly have a champion that is literally untargettable in fights (because his Q cd is removed by auto's AND essence flare, and further by kills/assists)on top of dealing 60-90% of his damage as true damage.
Now i'm just low elo trash but how the fuck do you balance that? "Just cc him lul" doesnt work if you can't ever target him.
